value.0:
Foreward by Tauronemhet: I remind all who read these words enscribed that they are the construct of the individuals interpretation of the eternal bodies sum parts. No man truly knows the Gods will, but he tries to understand it and explain as best he could.

::Ka::
Our Ka is literally the thing that is us, it is our thoughts, our intellect, our spiritual power, a reflection of the physical self. The Ka follows us throughout our lives, as we follow it. On the death of a Mulhorandi our Ka is that which is weighed and which creates the path for our Akh to live eternally in Paradise.

The Ka is the sustenanace of the Mulhorandi's eternal body.

::Ba::
Our Ba is what makes us Mulhorandi. It is the essence of personality, our underlying selves, it is the non-physical qualities that make us the person we are. The Ba resides with the body on our deaths. The Ba can move between the realms of this life and the other making it possible for our eternal body to become Akh.

The Ba is the breath of the Mulhorandi's eternal body.

::Akh::
Our Akh is our intended form within the world beyond. When the Ba and Ka are unified it allows the Akh to be named an Anscestor and live beyond as a Shining One.

::Ren::
Whosoevers name is uttered then so shall he live. Our names are important because if we are not named quickly we come into existence incorrectly our Ma'at already heavily weighed. To ensure the Shining Ones live on ever after remember to speak of them, for it is the utterance of the word that is important to providing the Akh of our Anscestors a place in the everafter.

::Shwt::
The Shadow is a living entity for all Mulhorandi, it is our protection just as the shadow of the fig or palm is our protection. Thus the shadow must also be protected from perversion, should the shadow be corrupted then the Ba and Ka become open to corruption.
The Ka, Ba, Akh and the Name and the Shadow
